general.place_share: Look at this place I found in Decentraland:

place_description.like_percentage_explanation: Like percentage is calculated from likes given by users with over 100VP

content_moderation.you_are_about_title_t: You're about to change {place_name}'s rating to Teen (PG 13+)
content_moderation.you_are_about_description_t: This means that everyone will be able to see the scene's content without a warning.
content_moderation.you_are_about_description_a: This scene has been flagged by the community for potentially containing adult content that may be inappropriate for some users.
content_moderation.you_are_about_description_r: This means that nobody will be able to see this scene's content.

confirmed_rating.title: {scene_name} has been rated {rating}
confirmed_rating.description_t: The rating for {scene_name} has been successful changed to Teen (PG 13+). This content is now available to all users aged 13 and above.
confirmed_rating.description_a: The rating for {scene_name} has been successful changed to Adult (PG 18+). This content is now only available to users aged 18 and above.
confirmed_rating.description_r: The rating for {scene_name} has been successful changed to Restricted. This content is now no longer visible in Decentraland.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.no_favorite_selected: You haven’t added any Places to your favorites
favorites.no_world_selected: You haven’t saved any Worlds to your favorites

worlds.description: Your own 3D Space in the Metaverse. A place for Decentraland citizens to build, experiment, and host events and even interactive experiences without owning LAND.

home.title: Places Overview
home.description: Decentraland is a virtual social platform built and governed by its users. Every day, users enter the world to meet up, play games, attend live events, trade in the marketplace, engage with brands, visit galleries and much more
home.creator: @decentraland
